messages.msgSnippet: http://celestialcoupon.whitehorse.com/ There s a link to a coupon for a box of Celestial Seasonings tea, but you need to go there and print it by May 18 and
messages.messageBody:
http://celestialcoupon.whitehorse.com/


There's a link to a coupon for a box of Celestial Seasonings tea, but you
need to go there and print it by May 18
and then redeem it by the end of June.

I wanted to say something about this list being so quiet. I don't mind.
Some people are here because they like my website. Lately I've put more
energy into the website than anything else, and updates are here:
http://sandradodd.com/announcements

There's also a way to get announcements to site news and news of publication
and speaking engagements and such by subscribing to a yahoogroups announcement
list by e-mailing here:

sandradodd-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

-For those who came to this list for John Holt input, here's something new:
http://sandradodd.com/holt/teachyourown
and this (not new):
http://sandradodd.com/johnholt
and there are other lists (some busier) here:
http://sandradodd.com/lists/other

Just to tide you all over until this list gets busy sometime. <g>

Sandra
